CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: By replacing a branched 2ethylhexyl side chain with a linear n-octyl group , Zhang and his co-workers synthesized a PTB7-Th derivative namely , PBTT.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| branched 2ethylhexyl side chain |
| n-octyl group |
| PTB7-Th |
| PBTT |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PTB7-Th |
| PBTT |

Explanation:

* "branched 2ethylhexyl side chain" and "n-octyl group" are not material names by themselves, but rather describe the modifications made to the original material.
* "PTB7-Th" and "PBTT" are the names of the materials mentioned in the paragraph.
